parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set marker size.
Size is in format [a-axis, b-axis].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> markerName '''setMarkerSizeLocal''' [a-axis, b-axis]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [a-axis, b-axis]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> a-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 width of marker

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> b-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 height of marker

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerSizeLocal]] [100, 200];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerAlpha]], [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]], [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerBrushLocal]], [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]], [[setMarkerDir]], [[setMarkerDirLocal]], [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerPosLocal]], [[setMarkerShape]], [[setMarkerShapeLocal]], [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerText]], [[setMarkerTextLocal]], [[setMarkerType]], [[setMarkerTypeLocal]]
</value></part></template>
